#Your first day as a rifleman!
- Just woke up from cryosleep? Well you're probably hungry, so you should head to the food vendor.
- Next head to the standard equipment rack to get your armor and storage!
- And finally, visit the automated weapons rack to pick a weapon and mags to go with it! We recommend the M41A Pulse Rifle for beginners. - Also make sure to grab a few armor piercing (AP) mags for the heavier xenos!
- Now you're ready to kill xenomorphs! Try to find the meeting room with your squadmates if the operation hasn't started yet. - Otherwise, ask around for help finding the dropship and get in there!
